frameDefinitions: In this frame a Speaker ceases speaking, sometimes about a particular Topic.
An Asset is in a state where it is exposed to or otherwise liable to be affected by a Harmful_event, which may be metonymically evoked by reference to a Dangerous_entity.
A Cause (or associated Actor) causes an ongoing Process to temporarily stop.
A Protagonist is described as being exposed to a potentially dangerous situation that may end in a Bad_outcome for him- or herself.
A Fuel, some flammable object or substance, ends up on fire.
The words in this frame involve an Undesirable_event which affects the Patient negatively.
frameExamples: Finally, Jan <t>shut</t> <t>up</t> about his car accident.
If you are a farmer, you are at <t>risk</t> for hearing loss caused by noise exposure in your work.
The first <t>calamity</t> was a disastrous trade war with Holland.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Speaker</fen> has previously been speaking but has now stopped.
The <fen>Expressor</fen> is the <fen>Speaker</fen>'s voice or other communicative noise emitted by the <fen>Speaker</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the becoming silent occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is the location where the becoming silent occurs.
Something judged to be desirable or valuable which might be lost or damaged.
An action that may occur or a state which may hold which could result in the loss of or damage to the <fen>Asset</fen>.
A concrete or abstract entity which may come to cause the loss of, or damage to the <fen>Asset</fen> either due to its participation in a <fen>Harmful_event</fen>.
The time period during which the <fen>Asset</fen> enjoys  the specified level of security from a <fen>Harmful_event</fen>.

A particular location in which the <fen>Asset</fen> is secure. Frequently, it is to be inferred that the characteristics of the location protect the <fen>Asset</fen> from a potential <fen>Harmful_event</fen>.
A force, process, or event that produces the interruption.
The <fen>Process</fen> goes into a paused state due to the <fen>Cause</fen> or <fen>Actor</fen>.
An entity which participates in a <fen>Cause</fen>, perhaps volitionally and perhaps not, but effectively causing the interruption.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the interruption occurs.
Where the interruption takes place.
The person who is at risk of some <fen>Bad_outcome</fen>
A situation that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> would like to avoid.
Something desirable possessed by or directly associated with the <fen>Protagonist</fen> which might be lost or damaged.
The <fen>Action</fen> that creates the risk.
The time when the risk pertains.
The place where there is risk.

The total material currently involved in combustion, including both the parts of the <fen>Fuel</fen> currently undergoing chemical alteration and the partially ionized gas that results from this process.
The entity that is begins to undergo rapid chemical alteration leading to damage or destruction.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fire</fen> begins to burn.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Fire</fen> begins to burn.
The undesirable event which occurs.
The entity that experiences the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen>.
When the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen> occurs.
Where the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen> takes place.
listRoleExamples: There is a locked padlock that guarantees <fex>the information</fex> is secure.
Our system ensures that information stored within hardware is secure <fex>from external software attack and physical theft</fex>.
We make sure your BMW is secure <fex>against intruders</fex>.

Israel is insecure <fex>today</fex> not because it does
not have enough military power.
Workers need to make sure their property is secure <fex>at work</fex>.
<fex>Leaving the page after you've clicked 'Download'</fex> will interrupt the transfer.
Leaving the page after you've clicked 'Download' will interrupt <fex>the transfer</fex>.
In such cases <fex>the server</fex> will automatically interrupt the process.
There was no risk <fex>of his returning</fex>.
The risk <fex>to his reputation</fex> was significant.
<fex>Implementing this program</fex> runs the risk of offending our core constituents.
<fex>Even after the end of Apartheit</fex> we still run the risk of letting racism continue forever.
There is always some danger to rich men <fex>in a bar like this</fex>.
An <fex>environmental</fex> disaster is just what we need.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: only three months to a year
the UN's Commission on Human Rights
the UN Development Fund for Women
